name: Paper Defender - BETA
description:
NOTE

This is an early build of the game. Still some bugs to work out. Thanks for playin!

THE GAME

Become the doomed defender, Origami Johnson, and fight off waves of angry bad-drawings, upgrade your ship, finish the to-do list, and escape the DoodleWorld. 

Includes 2 levels (and a super secret boss level)

ARROW KEYS = MOVE

SPACE BAR = SHOOT

***

THE DEV

Hi. I'm Luke.

I started making stuff on my computer in my early teens and never looked back… and now I have really sore eyes.

I'm currently learning GameDev in 2020. This is my fifth game. 

***
